title: Another man dies in petrol queue
body_lines: A man who was standing in a queue to buy petrol at Wekada petrol shed in Panadura died this morning, police said.
According to the police, the deceased, a 53-year-old father of three had been waiting in the queue since last night.
He was a three-wheeler driver by profession living in Hirana, Panadura. (Sumith Pothupitiya)
